pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Toolbox for Radiometric Geochronology // An R implementation of Ken Ludwig's popular Isoplot add-in to Microsoft Excel. Currently plots U-Pb data on Wetherill and Tera-Wasserburg concordia diagrams. Calculates concordia and discordia ages. Performs linear regression of measurements with correlated errors using the 'York' approach. Future versions will include functionality for the Ar-Ar, Rb-Sr, Sm-Nd, Re-Os, U-Th-He, fission track and cosmogenic nuclide methods, including isochrons, age spectra, ternary diagrams, kernel density estimates, radial plots, banana diagrams and multidimensional scaling plots. A graphical user interface is provided as an RStudio Shiny app.
